entries.title_d: In our campaign to prevent the new Imperial space station from ever being built in the Lok system, we have decided to attack some of their freighters with building materials.
entries.title: Endor system: Make sure the Imperial freighters never reach Lok.
entries.split_quest_alert: Worvog Arkon < The Empire is counter-attacking! The good news is that our reinforcements are almost there! >
entries.quest_target_d: Your target of destruction is an Imperial Heavy Freighter. Although they are not dangerous they can withstand a lot of damage and it's sure to be heavily guarded.
entries.quest_location_d: For some reason the Imperial presence is heavy in the Endor system. To top it off their construction freighters are heavily guarded.
entries.quest_escort_t: Annihilate any trace of the fleet.
entries.quest_escort_d: You are ordered to annihilate that entire fleet, not just the freighter.
entries.failed_escape: They got away! Return to base, we are going to have to formulate a new plan.
entries.escort_wiped_out: Worvog Arkon: < Fantastic! Only one to go! >
entries.escort_remaining: Worvog Arkon: < Keep at it my friend, there's %DI ships remaining that need to be destroyed! >
entries.destroy_escort: Good work but I'm afraid that command wants that fleet annihilated!
entries.assassinate_success: Great job my friend! If nothing else, we have delayed any expansion ideas the Empire had in the Lok system.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We found them. Be careful though, we are picking up some strange ship signatures that we haven't encountered before.
entries.arrival_phase_1: We are tracking the Imperial freighters now, stand by.
